# Docs

<!-- Generated by documentation.js. Update this documentation by updating the source code. -->

## masterReducer

The entry point reducer for the application. All state changes that are
non-visual start here.

**Parameters**

-   `state` **State**  (optional, default `defaultState`)
-   `action` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 

Returns **State** 

## editorReducer

Reducer for editor data.

**Parameters**

-   `state` **[Editor](#editor)** 
-   `action` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
-   `rootState` **State** 

Returns **[Editor](#editor)** 

## documentReducer

Reducer for Document data.

**Parameters**

-   `state` **[Document](#document)** 
-   `action` **Action** 
-   `rootState` **State** 

Returns **[Document](#document)** 

## newRow

Returns a new Row.

**Parameters**

-   `type` **RowTypes** 

Returns **Row** 

## newColumn

Returns a new Column.

**Parameters**

-   `type` **ContentTypes** 
-   `value` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 
-   `options` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 

Returns **Column** 

## 

Layout elements define the layout of the page. Layout elements are the containers for Block elements.

## blockElements

Block elements are the elements that fit inside layout elements. They are the content of the page.

Type: {}

## getCode

Get the code from the hidden DOM element rendering the generated document

Returns **{type: [string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String), code: [string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)}** 

## addLayout

Add Layout element to the Document.

**Parameters**

-   `layoutType` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 
-   `insertAtIndex` **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** 

Returns **{type: [string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String), layoutType: [string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String), insertAtIndex: [number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)}** 

## addBlock

Add Block element to the Document.

**Parameters**

-   `blockType` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 
-   `insertAtRowIndex` **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** 
-   `insertAtCellIndex` **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** 

Returns **{type: [string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String), blockType: [string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String), insertAtRowIndex: [number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number), insertAtCellIndex: [number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)}** 

## editEditorSize

Set the size of the editor (in pixels)

**Parameters**

-   `size` **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** 

Returns **{type: [string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String), size: [number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)}** 

## editSelectedElement

Select an element by ID, setting it's to edit mode.

**Parameters**

-   `element_id` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 
-   `rowIndex` **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** 
-   `cellIndex` **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** 

Returns **{type: [string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String), element_id: [string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String), rowIndex: [number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number), cellIndex: [number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)}** 

## editBlockValue

Edit the value of a block/cell.

**Parameters**

-   `value` **([string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String) \| [number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number))** 

Returns **{type: [string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String), value: ([string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String) \| [number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number))}** 

## Drawer

**Extends React.Component**

View and edit the settings for an editor element.

## 

Implements the drag source contract.

## Block

React DnD wrapper for Block list element.

Type: React.ComponentType&lt;any>

## BuildingBlocks

**Extends React.Component**

Lists all Block elements. Drag and Drop functionality.

## 

Implements the drag source contract.

## Layouts

**Extends React.Component**

List of ready-made layouts/rows users can use to build to templates. Drag and drop functionality.

**Extends React.Component**

View and edit properties for a selected element.

**Extends React.Component**

View and edit properties for a selected element.

## Editor

**Extends React.Component**

View and modify the document.

## Document

**Extends React.Component**

The document to be edited. Document is shown in the Editor component and is a visualisation of the created form.

**Parameters**

-   `props` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)**
